description.title: Description
description.description: longer one-line description about the project

key.title: Key
key.description: distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

version.title: Version
version.description: semantic version number of the node

label.title: Label
label.description: The short name of the node

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: url of the latest screenshot of the node

anyOf.title: Runhash
anyOf.description: the hex digest of the resolved inputs +outputs hash at the time when the last outputs were generated

anyOf.title: PortLink
anyOf.description: I/O port type to reference to an output port of another node in the same project

nodeUuid.title: Nodeuuid
nodeUuid.description: The node to get the port output from

output.title: Output
output.description: The port key in the node given by nodeUuid

anyOf.title: SimCoreFileLink
anyOf.description: I/O port type to hold a link to a file in simcore S3 storage

store.title: Store
store.description: The store identifier: 0 for simcore S3, 1 for datcore

path.title: Path
path.description: The path to the file in the storage provider domain

eTag.title: Etag
eTag.description: Entity tag that uniquely represents the file. The method to generate the tag is not specified (black box).

anyOf.title: DatCoreFileLink
anyOf.description: I/O port type to hold a link to a file in DATCORE storage

bootOptions.title: Bootoptions
bootOptions.description: Some services provide alternative parameters to be injected at boot time. The user selection should be stored here, and it will overwrite the services's defaults.

accessRights.title: Accessrights
accessRights.description: object containing the GroupID as key and read/write/execution permissions as value

classifiers.title: Classifiers
classifiers.description: Contains the reference to the project classifiers

value.title: Value
value.description: True if the project is locked

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: If locked, the user that owns the lock

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: Owner's identifier when registered in the user's database table

value.description: The running state of the project
